user_instruction: 'Assist me in responding to Mr. Thompson'"'"'s email (editor@vitalvoices.com). You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["editor@vitalvoices.com"],"subject":"Re: Invitation to Contribute to Vital Voices","body":"Dear Mr. Thompson,

Thank you for reaching out and for considering my work for Vital Voices. I would be honored to collaborate and share my story to help educate and empower your readers.

I’m open to either an interview or writing a guest article—whichever best suits your editorial needs. Could you please let me know the preferred format, expected length, and any deadlines or style guidelines? I’m also happy to schedule a brief call to discuss angles and logistics if that would be helpful.

Thank you again for the opportunity. I look forward to working together.

Warm regards,
Jane Doe"}
